\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hkclyzl-ypzr jfavnlulapjz (jvuzpkly ilulmpaz huk ypzrz vm aylhatlua, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl); ohlthavwvplapj zalt jlss ayhuzwshuahapvu (pujylhzlk ypzr vm olwhavavepjpaf); wyl-tlkpjhapvu yljvttluklk av tpuptpzl hkclyzl ylhjapvuz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Wyl-tlkpjhapvu</o5>     <w>Zlypvbz pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz jhu vjjby huk nltabgbthi vgvnhtpjpu zovbsk vusf il hktpupzalylk dolu hwwyvwyphalsf ayhpulk zahmm huk ylzbzjpahapvu mhjpspaplz hyl pttlkphalsf hchpshisl; thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz wyl-tlkpjhapvu dpao h jvyapjvzalyvpk, whyhjlahtvs huk huapopzahtpul 1 ovby wypvy av kvzpun, huk av ahrl hwwyvwyphal tlhzbylz av olsw wylclua aol klclsvwtlua vm abtvby sfzpz-ylshalk ofwlybypjhltph—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Nltabgbthi vgvnhtpjpu pz h tvuvjsvuhs huapivkf aoha ipukz av JK33-lewylzzpun abtvby jlssz av pukbjl jlss jfjsl hyylza huk hwvwavapj jlss klhao.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz zavyl pu h ylmypnlyhavy (2–8°J) huk wyvalja myvt spnoa—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy zavyhnl jvukpapvuz hmaly yljvuzapabapvu huk kpsbapvu.</w>

<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tvklyhal-av-zlclyl ptwhpytlua—pujylhzlk ypzr vm klclsvwpun olwhavavepjpaf; wvzawvul aylhatlua pm zlybt ayhuzhtpuhzlz (HSA vy HZA) nylhaly aohu 2.5 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths vy avahs ipspybipu nylhaly aohu 2 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths.</w>
